bibl.title: Normality and Distinctiveness in the Epigraphy of Greek and Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Version originale: Normalité et spécificité de l'épigraphie grecque et romaine de l'Égypte, Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 15-35.
BINGEN Jean, Normality and Distinctiveness in the Epigraphy of Greek and Roman Egypt.
Jean BINGEN, Hellenistic Egypt. Monarchy, Society, Economy, Culture. Edited with an Introduction by Roger S. BAGNALL (Edinburgh, 2007) pp. 256-278, 2 figg.
